1: ·Praise [L Bless] the Lord, all you servants of the Lord, you who ·serve [L stand] at night in the ·Temple [L house] of the Lord.
2: Raise your hands in the ·Temple [L holy place] and ·praise [bless] the Lord.
3: May the Lord bless you from Mount Zion [L the location of the Temple], he who made heaven and earth [Gen. 1].
